channel.title: Helppppp!
channel.description:
HOW DO I GET MY SERVER ON SO PPL CAN JOIN AND HOW DO I KNOW WHAT THE IP FOR MY SERVER IS FOR PPL TO JOIN LIKE FOR INSTANCE
JBIRDSCAPE.NO-IP.INFO HOW DO I DO THAT <---- PLZ HELP ME I NEED IT BAD ALSO HOW DO I MAKE MYSELF ADMIN OF MY SERVER EVERYTIME I SET MY RIGHTS TO 3 WHEN I LOG ON ITS NOT THERE...

item.description:

Ok for the ip u need no-ip or hamachi, iff u useing a router u will nee to port forward for no-ip, iff u dont want to do that use hamachi, there is a whole page on it on Tutorial page, cba getting link >.<

item.title: Helppppp!
item.dc:creator: @n0vamage n0vamage
item.description:
@n0vamage wrote:

cccrrraaazzziii:

First off, take the caps out, you will gain no more attention than anyone else with caps. Secondly, for anything related to making your own server, visit Mod Taharok’s Ultimate Server Guide in the Tutorials Section for help.

yes exactly take out capse and clerify and for the admin question youll need to search

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = mod, 2 = staff, 3 = admin and you should see somthing about

if playerName(“admin”)
(playerRights = 3)
change the name in it to your name and save compile and run

hope this helps

`n0va

Read full topic
